Beerskis Seven Springs January 1992

Just before the Washington Redskins played in the 1991 (January 26, 1992) Super Bowl in Minneapolis, MN our group took a 3-night trip to Seven Springs but still returned in time to watch the game. Here we are gathering for the bus in Tyson's Corner, Virginia. Taking the bus always helped us start the party early to get everyone warmed up for Thursday night skiing!

A nice view of Seven Springs from the top of the ridge on Wagner Slope, the central run at the base of the front side of Seven Springs mountain.
